description: Every prefix (or suffix) of palindromic prime a(n) is prime (right/left-truncatable).
references: Angell, I. O. and Godwin, H. J. "On Truncatable Primes." Math. Comput. 31, 265-267, 1977.
links: Index entries for sequences related to truncatable primes
C. K. Caldwell, Left and Right truncatable primes.
P. De Geest, The list of 4260 left-truncatable primes
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime strings
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._ and _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999.
